summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue Northeast, from East 57th Street to East 65th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8157 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of Payment by Bonds.
